text: Gwyneth Paltrow and producer Brad Falchuk are finally hubsand and wife. According to ET Online, the couple married yesterday in front of family and friends at Paltrow's Hamptons home. The guest list was predictably star studded, with celebs like Robert Downey Jr., Jerry Seinfeld, Cameron Diaz, and Benji Madden in attendance. The wedding was dreamt up by Paltrow and made special due to new renovations in her home. ` ` They have been planning this wedding all year,'' a source said. ` ` Gwyneth pays attention to every details so we are all set for a fairytale wedding.''
